page.title: 11LIFE IN BICESTER
page.content: LIFE STYLES:Bicester is a small market town and quite a close community. There is a wide cross-section of people - top personalities in the villages and locals who have been here for generations.There is very little entertainment in Bicester itself.There are two good restaurants and two hotels which hold occasional social functions. There are two youth clubs and a snooker club. In the main, most people travel away from Bicester to follow cultural interests and find entertainment. SHOPPING:Bicester contains a wide variety of shopping facilities.Most articles can be obtained locally, both household goods and clothing. HEALTH:Two practices operate from the Health Centre,covering a 7 mile radius. HOUSING:Bicester is continually growing with new estates on the edge of town.In the centre,flats have been built.
